sentences.en: a shirt with black and white stripes
A ticket that contains only printed information and does not have a magnetic stripe.
sentences.cn: 只含有印刷信息但不带有磁条的一种证券.

sentences.en: Bulmer is the UK distributor for Perrier and the Jamaican lager Red Stripe.
sentences.cn: 布尔默公司是巴黎水和牙买加红带拉格啤酒的英国分销商。

sentences.en: Cut chicken breast into stripe. Season with the pepper and salt.
sentences.cn: 鸡胸肉切条状, 以胡椒及盐调味.

sentences.en: Each white petal had a stripe of red.
sentences.cn: 每一片白色的花瓣上都有一条红色的条纹.

sentences.en: His brother is a politician of the worst stripe.
sentences.cn: 他的兄弟属于最不入流的政客.

sentences.en: His dark socks, I could see, had a stripe on them.
sentences.cn: 我能看出他的深色袜子上有道条纹.

sentences.en: I say, Henry, you've got yourself another stripe!
sentences.cn: 喂, 亨利, 你的肩章上又多了一条杠了.

sentences.en: It is generally thought that stripe phase is a new quantum state.
sentences.cn: 条纹相是在过渡金属氧化物研究中发现的一种特殊的现象.

sentences.en: Other examples are the floppy - disk, magnetic - stripe cardreader , and inter - machine communications links.
sentences.cn: 其它的例子是软磁盘 、 磁条 、磁卡读出机和机内通信链.

sentences.en: She wore a bright green jogging suit with a white stripe down the sides.
sentences.cn: 她身穿一套裤腿两边有白色条纹的亮绿色慢跑服。

sentences.en: So fuck off with your sofa units and strinne green stripe patterns.
sentences.cn: 去你的沙发和绿条纹沙发布.

sentences.en: The book has a diagonal black stripe on the cover.
sentences.cn: 书的封面上有条连接对角的黑斜线.

sentences.en: The plates have a blue stripe round the edge.
sentences.cn: 这些盘子边缘上有一道蓝线.

sentences.en: We should consider the stripe - contact device.
sentences.cn: 我们应考虑这个条形 电极接触 器件.

sentences.en: Well , I bet you're real lucky with this cheap magnetic stripe reader and palm top, huh?
sentences.cn: 我打赌这个不值钱的读卡器和这个掌上电脑确实给你带来不少好运, 没错吧?

words.tran_cn: 拆开；去膜；加条纹；条纹图案
剥夺（strip的过去分词形式）；脱衣；把…剪成条状

trans.tran_cn: 条纹，种类，军士军阶，犯人穿的横条囚衣
trans.tran_en: a line of colour, especially one of several lines of colour all close together
to mark with a stripe or stripes
